content.rendered:
Dr. Armen Mergerdichian
D.D.S.

Dr. Armen Mergerdichian D.D.S.

Dr. Armen decends from a line of accomplished dentists in his family tree, inspiring him to continue the tradition of practicing dentistry and provide quality service for his community.

In addition to his extensive qualifications, Dr. Megerdichian is well known for his particularly friendly and compassionate behavior with his patients.

With Dr. Armen Megerdichian’s dedication and commitment to excellence, Gardena Dental Group continues to proudly serve their community with the finest in dental care, at affordable prices.

Education

  • Bachelor’s Degree, California State University Northridge
  • Doctor Dental Surgery (DDS), UCLA 1991 - Served as a Clinical Instructor at UCLA for many years, mastering Full Mouth Reconstruction, Aesthetic Restoration, Complete Smile Makeovers, Dental Implants, I.V. Sedation, and Cosmetic Restorations. By persistently keeping up on the always-evolving technologies in the dental industry
  • Advanced training in Implant and Bone Grafting, All-on-Four Full Mouth Reconstruction

Memberships & Affiliations

  • FELLOWSHIP, International Congress of Oral Implantologists (ICOI)
  • San Fernando Valley Dental Society (SFVDS)
  • California Dental Society
  • American Dental Society
  • American Dental Association
  • Academy of Periodontology
  • American Society of Dental Anesthesiologist
